info.name: AgentAutoAddRemove
info.description:
If an agent has the "autoAuthorize" or "autoManage" parameter set to true, they will be automatically authorized when they are registered and unauthorized/removed when unregistered. Based on https://github.com/FLGMwt/team-city-agent-auto-auth.
NOTE: This plugin eliminates the need for manually authorizing, unauthorizing, and cleaning up TeamCity agents with the server, hence, it is important that this configuration is only used with a TeamCity server that is only exposed to trusted environments and agents.
